availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Morgan Ranson (Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney.)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney. Washington County, Pennsylvania, native. Son of R.H. Ranson and Augusta DeHaven Ranson. Married to Mary W. Smith Ransom in Kenton County, Kentucky, on November 15, 1859. Father of Wright Ranson and Richard Ranson. Attorney in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington/Ward 1, p. 547.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington/Ward 4, p. 235A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #007719732.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #14305.
"Joseph Morgan Ranson Sr. (1834-1920)," Find A Grave, Memorial #870706834, accessed June 30, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/87076834/joseph-morgan-ranson.
